jobs.description:
This role will be responsible for front end web page development and working with various content management systems (CMS) to create and deploy content for websites.



Responsibilities Include:




• Developing cross-browser and cross-platform compatible solutions using HTML/CSS/JavaScript
• Maintaining client portals in Alfresco content management system.
• Providing accurate timing estimates on front end website development efforts.
• Contributing to documentation
• Develop and test across multiple browsers, platforms, and devices, including smartphones and tablets.
• Backwards compatibility coding


Knowledge & Skills




• Working knowledge of JavaScript and the jQuery library
• knowledge of web and mobile UX/UI
• Ability to estimate effort based on high level requirements.
• Experience with Subversion or other version control system
• Experience integrating HTML/CSS with Java server-side code using Eclipse/MyEclipse
• 3 - 6 years of overall professional experience in designing and development of rich web based applications.
• Sound understanding of web analytics in relation to web design
• Understanding/familiarity with Web Accessibility / ADA
• Results oriented with strong customer focus and good communication skills.
• Demonstrated ability to exercise good judgment, prioritize multiple tasks, and problem solving under pressure of deadlines and resource constraints.
• Passion for work - willing to work extra hours if needed
• Must be very organized and able to work with other groups who are not.
• Familiarity with patternlab.io a big plus
